storyInfo: The town's mayor learns of the Sarkaz's true goal and alerts everyone by firing the cannon meant for the harvest festival's celebration. Nonetheless, the Arts Circle is activated. Siege and the Exemplars arrive just in time to lend their aid.

attributes.text: Fear. It's a tolerance that we are naturally born with, just like how plants are able to adapt to soil that make havoc of their own rootstocks.
To shatter our will, they'll need to spread a much great 'dosage' of fear in Brentwood.
Freda is the greatest testament.
\nShe is so fragile that you could break her simply by bumping into her, but she persisted among that crowd of terrifying men up till now.
But I can tell that she needs someone to confide in and vent her fear.
Will... he's not mature enough. It's not very likely he would understand how Freda feels.
Perhaps I can help her?

attributes.content: You didn't bring my order to my tent... Magdelene.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: And you didn't leave Brentwood either. A pitiful decision.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: He seems very feeble, even more so than yesterday.
\nWhat happened?

attributes.content: Why didn't you leave?
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: This is my home.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Do you have a new order for me? I can bring it to you along with the flowers last night.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: ...You don't have to worry about those orders anymore.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: I'm here to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: I'm leaving soon... to fight as part of the Nachzehrer King's army...
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Goodbye, if that's what you wanted to hear from me.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: You're too naive... to the point of foolishness.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Everything that I've tried to protect, always courts its own destruction.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Perhaps I've been wrong from the start.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: I don't understand what you're saying, Shovel.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: I used to be incredibly jealous of all of you.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Victoria used to be the noblest and strongest nation there was. Naturally, you possessed many great things, and rightfully so.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: With the metallurgy you originated and the Steam Knights, you conquered another empire. With your mystifying art and rich academia, you attracted all of Terra's geniuses...
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Yet now, you've halted your outward conquest. Now, your rulers only indulge in parties and wine, only ever boasting about the medals on their chest.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: They crush their own glory, and they are destined to be replaced—
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Hm? You still have this wall clock...
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Time really flies. The town's citizens must all have gone to the work site.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Your deaths are unavoidable, Magdelene.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: The Sanguinarch is an impatient man.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: That's why the ritual was pushed forward, and under that Feline's leadership, the mission was indeed completed most marvelously.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Everyone here will be the key to the ritual's activation.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Of course, that includes you.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: Ritual... Key...

attributes.content: He was stopped by the devils at the Sarkaz barracks just now.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Freda... Do you see that?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: The blood-colored worm is staring at me.
<color=#cc0000>'The entire town will be the key to the ritual's activation.'</color>
The key...
\nMy soul is trembling.

attributes.content: I need to go find Freda!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Let me go!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: You mustn't leave this greenhouse.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Wait a little longer, Magdelene. I'll be here with you.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Until we bid each other farewell for the last time.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Why... The people of the town have never done anything against your wishes!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Freda and everyone fulfilled each and every one of your requests!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: His Highness decided to carry out this war, and your dukes responded. This outcome has nothing to do with us or you.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: All we need to do is follow our orders.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Then let me warn the people at the work site! Just pretend you don't know anything like before, please!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: I serve His Highness, and I won't allow you to quash this ritual...
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Not unless you make it past me, Magdelene.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Can you do it, Gardener?
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: \nHe grabs me by the hand, but places it on a pair of scissors in his hand.
\nThere seems to be a ray of longing burning in the depths of his ashen eyes.
\nWhat is this prideful man longing for?
\nRelease? Pity? Or is it perhaps... that word that I can't bring myself to touch?
I notice that even though the two of us have spent a very long time together in this greenhouse, I've never actually truly understood this man.
\nBut I have to leave now. Just as he said, there is no time.
I'm sorry.
\nI can't stand by and watch anymore—

attributes.content: Magdelene, where are you going? Why the rush?
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.content: Is that... blood on your clothes...? Are you okay?
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.content: It's fine—I cut my finger while I was pruning branches...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Henk, where's Freda?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Freda? After she came back from the barracks by herself this morning, she went straight to the Sarkaz officers.
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.content: She seemed rather out of it, and she kept saying sorry no matter who she ran into.
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.content: Did something happen?
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.content: Everyone has to leave this place right now.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: And the farther, the better!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: What's with all of you being so bloody barmy today?
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.content: There's no time to explain. I need to tell everyone else!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: But we're almost finished! Besides, if we all ditch work, what are we supposed to do when those officers find us?
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.content: Fireworks? Where?
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.content: Who blew that wall open? Is that... Freda?
attributes.name: Skeptical Citizen

attributes.text: The last time I saw such beautiful fireworks. It was the harvest festival when I was ten.
\nGrandfather put me on his shoulders and walked through the crowd.
\nEveryone looked up to the fireworks blooming in the sky astonished. Everyone kept quiet, only for the silence to be torn apart by the explosive sound wave a moment later.
\nThis is just like that.
Freda set off the cannon Mr. West was hiding for the harvest festival. There are countless Sarkaz pulling her from behind.
\nDrenched in blood, she is shouting something, but whatever she is trying to say, it's buried by the cannon's loud roar.
\nShe is buried by the wave of Sarkaz gushing toward her and torn apart.
A flame burning bright in the middle of the day—
\nThe cannons keep roaring.
\nA grand ceremony has come to Brentwood ahead of schedule.

attributes.content: What just happened? Is there an earthquake?
attributes.name: Frightened Civilian

attributes.content: R-Run!
attributes.name: Frightened Woman

attributes.content: You're bleeding... Bollocks... Stay away! Those disgusting monsters are dripping from your body!
attributes.name: Frightened Civilian

attributes.content: What are the Sarkaz trying to do?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Henk, Henk! You can't close your eyes...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: I... I'm starting to feel very tired too... So sleepy...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: I can feel my own blood fluttering out of my body.
\nBefore disappearing into the earth.

attributes.content: Magdelene! Hang in there!
Captain, I got her!
Everyone, hold onto the ropes as tight as you can. Do not touch the ground, no matter what!
Hurry and help them!
Magdelene, you can't fall asleep!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: This guy's so heavy!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Unconscious Civilian

attributes.content: Feist... The Self-Salvation Corps... Why are you...?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: We figured something went wrong when we saw fireworks in the middle of the day! They sealed the wall we blew open yesterday, but that cannon gave us a new path.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Hold onto Rockrock's hand, Magdelene! Our forces don't have enough manpower, and we're bringing everyone to evacuate as soon as we can!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Woahh! Feist, your zipline's even faster after those modifications you made!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Right, where is Mayor Freda? We haven't been able to locate her.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: ...Freda is—
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Drat, why did my zipline start shaking?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What about that weak garrison commander? Where is he hiding this time?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Well, no matter... I'll take over command.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I can feel it. My blood... is boiling.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: No need to contact Major Ulšulah's squad. We can take care of these laughable Victorians by ourselves.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Kill them all.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The garrison here is mounting a counter-attack. They're putting more pressure on us than any Sarkaz we've faced before!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: How much explosive does Old Weiss still have outside? Can he make it here in time to back us up?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Probably not happening. Not counting the members who laid the ziplines for us, we barely had any fighting men to begin with.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Start the Crawlers! We need to break through by force!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rockrock, watch out! Your zipline!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Ah—
attributes.name: Rockrock
Rockrock
attributes.content: That hurts—

attributes.name: Rockrock
attributes.content: Magdelene, are you okay?
Can you walk? Gah, these disgusting things—
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.text: On the sundering earth, a large number of red worms keep gushing onto surface. They chew on every soul they can reach and suck their blood.

attributes.content: This is the Prince's blessing. It's the kindness the Royal Court left for us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: In our bodies... our purest blood is now awakening. Let's waste no more time on these Victorians!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Rockrock, you should go—
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: The Feline girl named Rockrock takes out a dagger from her waist and stuffs it into my hand.
\nA large group of Sarkaz are closing in on our location.

attributes.content: Magdelene, get ready to fight.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: It's not that hard. None of us... had any combat experience before.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Take a deep breath and make up your mind.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.text: Make up my mind.
\nRight.
\nJust like... that Sarkaz officer who collapsed among the fluttering petals.
I grip the dagger tight.
A shot rings out.

attributes.content: Artillery fire? I thought we used up all our explosives!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Quick, Rockrock, Magdelene, now!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We were contacted by a few old friends. They brought a whole backup unit! They even have an identification code—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.text: Identification code?
\nIs it the military? Victorian... Right... the military is responding to the war.
\nThey must be a group of ice-cold men. They're here to kill the Sarkaz and save the Victorians. They—

attributes.content: 'The Exemplars!'
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.text: A thick, roiling cloud of dust is kicked up into the air all over within view. Again and again, bright flashes of light suddenly erupts across the ground.
\nWhat is that... A tank?
\nI can hear a firm, persevering female voice coming from Feist's communicator.

attributes.content: This is Tank Fire Team Horn. All units, make sure to stay clear of my blast zone.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Grenade loaded. Firing second barrage!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Opening created. Cover the Self-Salvation Corps and all citizens!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn, continue laying suppressive fire.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Those Arts Circles... We need to find a way to stop this bloody witchcraft.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina, have someone else drive. I want to join the ground combat!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hannah, eyes on the road!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Alright, alright!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Get the tank as close to the core of the Arts Circle as possible. I'll take care of that thing!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You have other tasks.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: All units, follow regular deployment formation. Morgan, Hannah, follow Horn's orders and cut open a path for the tank.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Lieutenant Shearer, Dagda, Delphine, take command of the ground forces and form a defensive line. Stop the Sanguinarch's worms.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm on it.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Mr. Misery, I'll leave the commander of the enemy forces to you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: All you need to do is boldly execute your plan.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Feist, it's been a while. We shall exchange pleasantries later. I need the Self-Salvation Corps to help set up a zipline that will take me above the Arts Circle.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We have no time to lose. Let us take care of the strange Arts Circle first.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I will leave my rear to all of you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.text: While I was still trying to identify the squad that suddenly came to our aid, the blond Feline has already ziplined to the center of the battlefield.
She descended from the sky, and bombastically made her way into the center of the Arts Circle's blood-red pillar of light. The sound of rocks blasted apart ring throughout the entire battlefield.
'Thump.'
\nI can see each and every swing of her large sledgehammer in that red light.
'Forward!'
The Feline's voice ignites the tank's engine.
\nI see a warrior holding a sledgehammer up high leading the Victorians to retake our land.

attributes.content: Look! Look how easily our Victorian tank fire can blast that thing apart!
attributes.name: Cheering Civilian

attributes.content: We said as much long ago. Them bloody devils are no match for Victoria's military!
attributes.name: Cheering Civilian

attributes.content: Crush them!
attributes.name: Cheering Civilian

attributes.content: No, there are too many Originium crystals in town...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: The mayor's office, the small town square, the library... those things we've been rebuilding day in and day out...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: We won't make it in time—
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Is it over?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: No...
The pillar of red light rises from the building we built and intermingles with the festive fireworks.
\nThere is a blood-red color boiling in that dark abyss.
\nThe similarly red worms are reaching their antennae toward the sky.

attributes.content: The Arts Circle has been damaged. The Vampires' offspring have gone berserk. Seize this opportunity!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Infantry units, stop advancing. Escort all citizens out of the Arts Circle's range.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Tank squad, follow me and push forward. Destroy the remaining Originium crystals in the town and commence search and rescue!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.text: Hell is invading my town.
\nAll while the formation's rumbling tank accelerates and blitzes in on the devils.
